thread.title: Southern Communication Specialists
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Southern Communication Specialists

author: Southern Communication Specialists
title: Southern Communication Specialists
text: Everything I have ordered so far has arrived on time and even before I expected it on 1 order. I have not had to return anything yet, so I can't respond to customer service at this time. Price is comparable to some of the other online stores but on time, free shipping, competative price so far.
